name: V_EHI_CLP_FILTER
description: Filter view for Claim Print Database (CLP) records for use in EHI export.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the claim print record.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The patient ID for this claim.

columns.name: RQG_ID
columns.description: The requisition grouper ID for this claim.
